archimate:Constraint.name: PEPPOL BIS 3
archimate:Constraint.documentation:
Business Interoperability Specifications (BIS) for common eProcurement processes.
The eProcurement specifications (PEPPOL BIS) maintained by OpenPEPPOL.
The PEPPOL BIS are formal requirements to ensure pan-European interoperability of procurement documents, such as eInvoices.
https://peppol.eu/what-is-peppol/peppol-profiles-specifications/
Bis 3 comply to the european norm
